tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Prathima Reddy is leading doctor in India who adheres to the oath taken during Doctor profession. She has taken care of me atmost all the way through my pregnancy, delivery and post delivery during covid times. She is the one whom I can close my eyes and trust her. Very disciplined, very professional, kind, very patient, ethical and caring. Gives you right direction through treatment and very crisp in her conversation, I look her as my role model. Thanks mam for being such a wonderful human being and Doctor.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First consultation with doctor, decided to go to her because she has such positive reviews and I've been desperately looking for a solution to my extreme menstrual cramps. After a wait time of 40 mins  and a fee of 1k, doctor asked me a few hygiene questions and asked me to come back with usual blood test reports and an ultrasound scan (though I showed her normal ultrasound reports done in the month of Oct 2022). My entire consultation lasted for 7-10 mins where I understood nothing about what's happening in my body that's causing such pain - * *** ****** **** **** **** ** ***** ** ******* **** *** **** * ****** **** **** **** **** ******** I am not sure if she was too busy or if my problem didn't seem important enough for her to help me understand it or this is how she is with her patients. Also one more thing - when I come back to show her with my test results, I am supposed to shell out 400 more (within 6 days) and 1000 (after 6 days, which is most likely as I am working and will only be able to show her on weekends) ** * *** *** ** ** ****** ****** *** ** **** ** **** ** **** * ******* ** ******* She might be a great doctor, just that I had a particularly sub par experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I waited for Dr. Pratima Reddy for quite a while today. She was busy in the OT since 7 am and finally I got to meet her by 2:30 pm. She came to attend to her patients immediately after she had performed surgery. She had not had time to have breakfast and it was way past lunch time too. But she was dedicated into looking at her patients and totally forgot about herself. Really admire her dedication towards her job.
She didn't suggest surgery for my problems.. instead she prescribed medication as a solution, while other doctors insisted on me getting a surgery. 
Thank you Dr. Prathima Reddy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had PCOS/ PCOD problem and was having problems in conceiving natural, and one of my aunt suggested me to consult DR Prathima Reddy and after consulting, her with few basic checkups for both of us (me and my husband). She said no problem as per reports but need to do some lifestyle changes like sleeping habits, food, and some regular Exercises, and told to come back after 6 months. Then later when we went back after 6 months by then I convinced natural only by doing some lifestyle changes no unnecessary tablets nothing. We were so happy and later with doctors guidelines we without any problem I had my delivery.  Her unique thing is she won't ask your option, she knows what to do and she will do as per her plan and that really works and anybody can just blindly trust her. I had some problem during delivery time but with her timely suggestions I was able to deliver without any problems.  And thank you for the staff of Fortis la femme as well. Thank you for Dr. Prathima reddy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I am very fortunate that I got in touch with Dr. Prathima Reddy for my pregnancy and delivery. I really thank the person who recommended her to me, and I recommend her to everyone now.  If I have to put it in a single line, then I'd say that Dr. Reddy is a no-nonsense doctor/person, and she provides genuine directions to patients. She encourages the patients for normal delivery till the last moment if there's no complication. What amazed me the most is that she was constantly there physically or over phone from the moment I admitted for my delivery. Later I discovered that she does it for all her patients, which I find extraordinary. I have become a fan of her ever since I met her, not only because of her treatment, proper guidance etc., *** **** *** *** ********** her simplicity and her awe-inspiring personality.  Thanks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very happy and fortunate to have chosen dr prathima Reddy mam for my both child's delivery, This is my second C- section under her which went well without any issues will be ever grateful for her.
Mam is extremely patient in listening gives appropriate advice and make us comfortable with her in the conversations.
My family and friends have been visiting her from last 15 years and more highly recommend her,whoever visits the doctor will be in safer hands .

We went to doctor for a second opinion. Was referred by a friend *** ********* **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ** *****
She took a detailed medical history and asked us to get done some tests and explained the next best thing to do. Very professional yet soft spoken and gives confidence to the patient/couple. Doctor is very crisp and clear in interaction.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Been consulting Dr. Prathima for close to 3 years now and feel so grateful that I was introduced to her. She is kind and caring and very precise in her advice. I no longer worry as I truly feel I am in safe hands and the best will be done, given any situation. She is a role model to a lot of her patients, who i am sure absolutely look up to her. I do. Our country needs more doctors like her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Prathima Reddy has been my doctor for many years. She is a brilliant doctor, one of the best in the country. She understands a problem, investigates it completely, and does a great job in treating it. She is also patient and understanding. I'm lucky to have her as my gynaecologist.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had PCOD for a long time. I had visited a lot of doctors but there was no long term effect from their treatments. But after I visited Dr. Prathima Reddy and taking up the three month hormone pill treatment my period cycles became completely normal after that.Also she suggested suitable treatment for acne and hair fall.I highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Very focused on her work, very experienced, and on point in diagnosis, very methodical and pre-emptive of things that can occur and suggests practical solutions.  Does not prescribe unnecessary medicines or unnecessary tests until required. Highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Have been visiting Dr.Pratima Reddy for the last 15 years and she has always been extremely empathatic. She Does thorough examination and will suggest tests only when it's utmost important. She will not start your medication unless she is sure of the diagnosis. She is patient enough to listen all your problems and puts the patient at ease. Would highly recommend her for some one who is looking for gynaec problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy,
review:
Dr. Prathima and Dr. Nivedita helped in delivering my baby girl. Despite of being covid positive, I insisted for normal vaginal delivery and they supported me throughout the whole process.  They made me very comfortable. They were checking on me every 5  minutes by taking all the precautions. I felt that I was in right hands for my delivery. Dr. Nivedita encouraged and motivated me for normal delivery. Hospital staff and the doctors became my family that day as no one was allowed from my side. 

I consulted Dr. Prathima online till my 6th month and it was seemless. 
I recommend both the doctors as they are very patient and respond to all the queries in detail. Dr. Prathima doesn’t recommend unnecessary medicines and tests. She always encourages for good diet and exercises which helped me a lot. I find her trustworthy and helping.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
The hotel management is horrible and so does the protocol.
I had to wait for 45 min just to hear that the case history will be taken by another doctor. Upon arguing that I am not comfortable to share the same with any other doc, the 
doc verbatim said what is it that you cannot share with another doc and that the protocol is that junior doctor collects the history. 
Question is if a doctor doesn't have time and patience to understand one's case ,why should a patient see that particular doctore. They can discuss and get diagnosis from the same one who took the case history
This doc is good and have consulted in the past, however today was disappointing
Very impatient doctor. She maybe be good but not very practical while liking at records. Made us wait 2 hours for a simple check up because one report was not printed.
**** ***********  ****** ** ********* ** we trust her blindly as she has always been a mentor and given right treatment
